TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit DeclineItemType extends ExchangeWebServices.WellKnownResponseObjectType

Docs.summary: The class represents a decline item response object that is used to reply to a meeting request or calendar item.

remarks.para: To decline a meeting request or calendar item, you must follow these steps:

item.description: Find the meeting request or calendar item by using a FindItem operation.
Get the item identifier of the meeting request or calendar item.
Pass the item identifier of the meeting request or calendar item to the ReferenceItemId property of the .
Call the CreateItem operation by using the response object type to decline the meeting request or calendar item.

remarks.para: Note: A user cannot decline a meeting request or calendar item for which the user is the organizer.

example.para: The following example shows you how to decline a meeting request. The item identifier of the meeting request is used in the property.

Docs.summary: The constructor initializes a new instance of the class.
